name: Mind 11
description:
NOTE:

I highly recommend that you download the game to get the full experience because of the browser limitations

‎ ‎

‎ ‎

Still, if you want to play the game on your web browser. 

Play it on Full Screen

if you need to Pause and Change Settings. Use P instead of ESC

‎ ‎

‎ ‎

‎ 

You are dreaming of the "Floor is Lava" game inside your house. But every time you touch the lava, Parkour changes!

Even though you remember the layout, you can't seem to remember the objects or their locations exactly.

Was that a bookshelf there, or was it a plant?

no two runs are the same

Challenge yourself to finish the level in under 11 seconds by mastering your parkour skills! 

Good Luck!


This game was made as part of the Mini Jam 105  Theme: Dreamy  Limitation: Every Playthrough is Unique

‎ 

‎ 

‎ 

Special thanks to...

InspectorJ for the Sound Effects

Kenney for the Furniture Kit
